summary:
Post-doctoral research:
My research at the University of Wyoming (Faculty of Geology and Geophysics) was focused on understanding morphological behavior of delta foresets under different flow and sediment conditions.


PhD research:
The PhD project was focused on understanding and modelling the behavior of river bed forms for flood management purposes. Specially the role of sediment transport is investigated on the morphology and evolution of sand dunes.

For this purpose, next to modelling, flume experiments have been carried out at the Technical University of Braunschweig (Germany) and University of Grenoble (France). 

To get an impression of these experiments and the scales involved, take a look at the video posted below.

PhD thesis:
http://purl.utwente.nl/publications/93253

Research on river morphodynamics and teaching', 'title': 'Researcher', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 12923, 'name': 'University of Wyoming', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQGMGGCkEBOiOQ/company-logo_400_400/0/1635179658209?e=1700092800&v=beta&t=A6GCSNJTVVYYnrtFj1lCscEzLZsnHI-EgcuhNKLumpo', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/school/university-of-wyoming/', 'employees': {'start': 1001, 'end': 5000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}, 'end': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Laramie, Wyoming', 'date': {'start': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}, 'end': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}}, 'company': 'University of Wyoming', 'description': 'My research at the University of Wyoming (Faculty of Geology and Geophysics) was focused on understanding morphological behavior of delta foresets under different flow and sediment conditions.', 'title': 'Postdoctoral Researcher', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 166686, 'name': 'PhD at University of Twente', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQGlJy8j9vKdjA/company-logo_400_400/0/1533909472654?e=1700092800&v=beta&t=I14FtFFTE3LlyMZrUtaHW6UL3SlP63spT_WEaSbvux4', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/school/university-of-twente/', 'employees': {'start': 1001, 'end': 5000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2008}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Enschede Area, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2010}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}}, 'company': 'University of Twente', 'description': 'Dunes are common bed forms in sand bed rivers and estuaries and are of central interest in water management purposes. Especially during floods dunes can grow rapidly resulting in a significant increase of flow resistance. Therefore, it is of great importance to be able to predict dune dimensions and conditions for the transition from dunes to other types of bed forms e.g. lower and upper stage plane beds. To be able to model dune evolution and dune dimensions adequately, knowledge on sediment transport processes is crucial as bed forms are generated by divergences and convergences of sediment. It is often assumed that bed load is the dominant transport mechanism in generating dunes and therefore suspended load is not taken into account in modeling dune evolution. However, in literature controversy exists about dynamic interaction between suspended load and dune mechanics. The main objective of this project is to model and quantify the effects of suspended load on dune morphology, dune evolution, and transition to lower and upper stage plane beds.', 'title': 'PhD Researcher', 'employment_type': None}, {'location': 'Enschede Area, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2008}, 'end': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}}, 'company': 'University of Twente', 'description': "Next to research, as a lecturer's assistant I am involved in teaching of several courses such as Fluid Dynamics, River Dynamics, River Systems and Seminar morphology. 

This also includes the supervising of bachelor students during their internship and writing their final thesis.", 'title': 'Lecturer assistant at University of Twente', 'employment_type': None}, {'location': 'Enschede Area, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2009}, 'end': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2009}}, 'company': 'University of Twente', 'description': 'In order to get insight in the wave-generated boundary layer streaming several analytical and the 1DV numerical POINT SAND model are compared under same wave conditions. The results are then used to adjust a generally used bed shear stress model (Nielsen and Callaghan).', 'title': 'Graduation MSc (cum laude)', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'General secertary at UT-Muslims', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2010}, 'end': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Enschede Area, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2010}, 'end': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}}, 'company': 'General secertary at UT-Muslims', 'description': 'UT-Muslims is an International association of the University of Twente for Muslims that study and work at this University. Our aim is to support students and staff of the University of Twente that come from abroad in participating and integrating in the Dutch culture.', 'title': 'UT-Muslims', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 165743, 'name': 'Rijkswaterstaat', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQGhKYCGmWAZCg/company-logo_400_400/0/1624689283990?e=1700092800&v=beta&t=kclBho0gBOWIrfp1tnjguuSTys_0oEMCwj-0HNeGj5s', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/rijkswaterstaat/', 'employees': {'start': 5001, 'end': 10000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2006}, 'end': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2006}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Rijkswaterstaat Lelystad', 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2006}, 'end': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2006}}, 'company': 'Rijkswaterstaat', 'description': "In this period I was doing research for my bachelor thesis at Rijkswaterstaat Lelystad.
